internal.content:
---
title: "Check the Training Resources "

---



## ðŸ“¥ STEP: Check if all Training Resources have been installed and are ready



You can follow along the process by running:
	
```bash
./tools/11_practicum/stream_remote_logs.sh                                                 
```

Or through the OpensHift Web Console:

* Select `default` Namespace
* Select `Pods`
* Click on the `waiops-easy-install-aimanager-practicum-...` Pod
* Select `Logs`

	![image](./../images/06_fzth_aimanager_load.png)

âœ… And **when done** you should get the following with `failed=0`.

```yaml

PLAY RECAP *********************************************************************
localhost                  : ok=XXX    changed=XXX    unreachable=0    failed=0    skipped=XXX    rescued=0    ignored=0



*****************************************************************************************************************************
 âœ… DONE
*****************************************************************************************************************************
                                                
```


<InlineNotification kind="error">

**Important - This takes up to 60 minutes**

This takes some time depending on what region of ROKS you have chosen.

Wait for the installation to complete before continuing. 


</InlineNotification>
